description.narrative: Asian University for Women is planned to celebrate 20th anniversary of ICPD in Bangladesh. This seminar is all about showcasing the local efforts and moving SRHR work in Bangladesh forward. It will provide cherish fresh perspectives, outside views, provocative and innovative thinking. . AUW seeks to educate women to become highly motivated and effective professionals, leaders and promoters of intercultural u

PLEASE REVIEW YOUR ANSWER AS THE QUESTION HAS BEEN CHANGED
AUW har inkommit med ansökan till Sveriges ambassad om finansiering av SEK 130 000 för att genomföra ett " Tre -dagars nationellt SRHR Seminarium 2014 : ICPD + 20 i Bangladesh " . Seminariet hålls I Chittagong under 20-22 maj 2014. Utifrån den bedömning som ambassaden gör beslutar ambassaden att finansiera projektet under perioden maj till augusti 2014 med SEK 130 000 för de delar av budgeten som är föreslaget för det svenska bidraget. Seminariet syftar till syftar till att demonstrera det lokala arbetet som en del av det regionala och globala ramverket av ICPD samt att stödja och utveckla den nya generationen av SRHR- ledare. Seminariets totala budget är SEK 325 000, varav Nederländernas ambassad finansierar med SEK 195 000 och resterande SEK 130 000 kronor föreslås finansieras av Sveriges ambassad.
AUW has applied to Embassy of Sweden for funding of SEK 130 000 to carry out the "Three-Day National SRHR Seminar 2014: ICPD + 20 in Bangladesh” in Chittagong during 20-22 May 2014. Given the evidence from the assessments above Sweden decides to fund the project for the period of May to August with SEK 130 000 for the parts of the budget earmarked for Swedish support in the proposal.
The intervention aims at showcasing the local efforts withint he regional and global environment and informing the new generation of SRHR leaders.
The intervention’s total budget is SEK 325 000, out of which the Embassy of Kingdom of Netherland's funding is approximately SEK 195 000 and the remaining SEK 130 000 is contributed by the Embassy of Sweden for logistics and communication and publicity.
